attributes.action: Zeitgeist - the movement towards a resource based economy and a far better future for the world.
attributes.additional_details:
Wake up world – it doesn’t have to be like this......
...This is a bit like asking Turkeys to vote for Christmas but:
A "Resource-Based Economic Model” is about taking a direct technical approach to social management as opposed to a Monetary or even Political one. We need to update the workings of society to the most advanced and proven methods Science has to offer, leaving behind the damaging consequences and limiting inhibitions which are generated by our current system of monetary exchange, profits, corporations and other structural and motivational components.
The Zeitgeist Movement
